comments.author: LadyRhonwyn.2501
comments.body:
Lawton Campbell.8517:
Nokomis.5076:

Then again I also read that daily achievements should be whitelisted automatically.

I haven’t gotten around to implementing that, so I’m still doing it by hand (and forgetting, as it seems).

Sometimes it’s easier to start implementing that than having to wait for missing numbers :p (been there, done that, and in the end you always wonder why you didn’t do it sooner!)

(missing today: 1927 and tomorrow 1874)

Edit:
And added already!

as much as I understood so far, achievements first needs to be whitelisted from the devs in order to appear in the API.

Then again I also read that daily achievements should be whitelisted automatically.

comments.author: Inculpatus cedo.9234
comments.body:

comments.author: Alien Purple.3504
comments.body:
New daily achievement(s) do not have individual achievement descriptions.

example:
https://api.guildwars2.com/v2/achievements?ids=1881,1879
returns: text: “all ids provided are invalid”

However these id’s were returned via
https://api.guildwars2.com/v2/achievements/daily (on 5/13/16 UTC)
as part of the PVE dailies.
